name: geologic surfmap
desc: The geologic_surfmap module provides a mechanism to drape lines onto Geologic surfaces

properties.name: Switch Property View
properties.desc: Edit the renderable (red) port properties for the module.

properties.name: Surface Offset
properties.desc: The Surface Offset parameter provides a means to offset the draped lines from the surface so that z-buffering will not make the lines ragged or partially invisible where they intersect the surface.

properties.name: Minimum Thickness
properties.desc: The Minimum Thickness parameter determines the minimum spacing between surfaces when hierarchy is imposed.

properties.name: Account For Hierarchy
properties.desc: The Account for Hierarchy toggle causes geologic surfaces that might otherwise intersect each other to be corrected to account for Geologic Hierarchy.

properties.name: Reverse Hierarchy
properties.desc: The Reverse Hierarchy toggle causes hierarchy to be imposed from the bottom up versus the normal top down

properties.name: Surface Selection
properties.desc: The Surface Selection sets the surface from the Input Geology to map the Mapping Field onto.
